result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَنَبُواْ ٱلطَّٰغُوتَ أَن يَعۡبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰۚ فَبَشِّرۡ عِبَادِ
result.translation: 17. Kuwa ka fogaada inay caabudaan Daaquut (ilaahyada beenta)4  oo u laabta Allaah (iyagoo toobad keen ah), waxay leeyihiin bishaaro; ee u bishaaree addoomahayga.
result.footnotes: 4. Daaquut waxaa loola jeedaa shaydaanka, ama wax kastoo la caabudo Alle sokadi iyagoo ku raalli ah caabudiddaas.
